-- Megatron --

Megatron's eyes flashed fear for just a slight second, not enough 
for anyone to notice as Galvatron suddenly attacked his chest area, 
almost as if he had sensed where Megatron was keeping the artifact.

He brings his axe up quickly, just in time to block the attack, but 
he was struggling to keep his axe in the path of the blade. Not 
seeing anything, but sensing that his opponent was have some sort of 
difficulties, he seized the moment of hesitation to attempt to 
finish off his enemy.

"And now, YOU DIE." Megatron pushes the sword blade aside, and 
brings his plasma cannon up into Galvatron's face. The energy begins 
charging as Megatron prepares to fire, the artifact stored in his 
chest compartement begins to pulse, shooting out bursts of light.

"What is this?!" Exclaims Megatron, "Nevermind it, I shall finish 
this fight first..." As he begins to fire the plasma cannon, a large 
ball of energy blasts outward from Megatron's chest, enveloping both 
Megatron and Galvatron.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatrons tail whipped out to block it and it was cut off in the 
process. 
> Spark shot from it. He howled in pain. His training let him 
continue on 
> blocking it out. Galvatrons saw a blip on his radar. An object 
Megatron was 
> carrying. It was causing a wierd energy to flow from it. He swung  
his sword 
> at it trying to free it. Any advantage he could get.
